subtests.name: Permissions-Policy header usb=() disallows getDevices in the top-level document.
Permissions-Policy header usb=() disallows requestDevice in the top-level document.
Permissions-Policy header usb=() disallows same-origin iframes.
Permissions-Policy header usb=() disallows workers in same-origin iframes.
Permissions-Policy header usb=() disallows cross-origin iframes.
Permissions-Policy header usb=() disallows workers in cross-origin iframes.
Inherited Permissions-Policy header usb=() disallows dedicated workers.
